Plot: A new kid in town assembles a fledgling rock band -- together, they achieve their dreams and compete against the best in the biggest event of the year, a battle of the bands.
Title: Bandslam
Writer: Josh A. Cagan (screenplay), Todd Graff (screenplay), Josh A. Cagan (story)
Actors: Aly Michalka, Vanessa Hudgens, Gaelan Connell, Scott Porter
tomatoConsensus: Bandslam is an intelligent teen film that avoids teen film cliches, in an entertaining package of music and coming-of-age drama.
